title: #![no_std] build fails if lib.rs exists

labels.name: A-diagnostics
labels.description: Area: Messages for errors, warnings, and lints

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: regression-from-stable-to-nightly
labels.description: Performance or correctness regression from stable to nightly.

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: A-translation
labels.description: Area: Translation infrastructure, and migrating existing diagnostics to SessionDiagnostic

body:
### Code [ice.tar.gz](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/files/9541639/ice.tar.gz) ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.65.0-nightly (228710758 2022-09-10) binary: rustc commit-hash: 2287107588d92889d282e6cd3c1ca5df34cd34a5 commit-date: 2022-09-10 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.65.0-nightly LLVM version: 15.0.0 ``` ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'identifier: "metadata_std_required", attr: None, args: FluentArgs([("add_info", String("")), ("crate_name", String("std")), ("locator_triple", String("x86_64-flos"))]), errors: [ResolverError(Reference(Variable { id: "current_crate" }))]', compiler/rustc_errors/src/translation.rs:91:17 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7fcf2de43eb0 - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::libunwind::trace::h1c0da60f68cd52d0 at /rustc/2287107588d92889d282e6cd3c1ca5df34cd34a5/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/mod.rs:66:5 1: 0x7fcf2de43eb0 - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::trace_unsynchronized::he45e10f3230d4a33 at /rustc/2287107588d92889d282e6cd3c1ca5df34cd34a5/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/mod.rs:66:5 2: 0x7fcf2de43eb0 - <::spawn_unchecked_, rustc_driver[45772c003865a0c4]::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}, core[5a729203526575bf]::result::Result<(), rustc_errors[4c251b6c70f47263]::ErrorGuaranteed>>::{closure#0}, core[5a729203526575bf]::result::Result<(), rustc_errors[4c251b6c70f47263]::ErrorGuaranteed>>::{closure#1} as core[5a729203526575bf]::ops::function::FnOnce<()>>::call_once::{shim:vtable#0} 41: 0x7fcf2de51173 - as core::ops::function::FnOnce>::call_once::h86a4b020a74606cb at /rustc/2287107588d92889d282e6cd3c1ca5df34cd34a5/library/alloc/src/boxed.rs:1940:9 42: 0x7fcf2de51173 - as core::ops::function::FnOnce>::call_once::he22d4ad283374c0d at /rustc/2287107588d92889d282e6cd3c1ca5df34cd34a5/library/alloc/src/boxed.rs:1940:9 43: 0x7fcf2de51173 - std::sys::unix::thread::Thread::new::thread_start::ha509852e7590b369 at /rustc/2287107588d92889d282e6cd3c1ca5df34cd34a5/library/std/src/sys/unix/thread.rs:108:17 44: 0x7fcf2dba678d - 45: 0x7fcf2dc278e4 - clone 46: 0x0 - error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.65.0-nightly (228710758 2022-09-10) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: --crate-type lib -C panic=abort -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental=[REDACTED] -Z unstable-options note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack error: could not compile `flos` ```
Backtrace

``` Stack backtrace: 0: anyhow::error:: for anyhow::Error>::from 1: cargo_bootimage::main 2: std::sys_common::backtrace::__rust_begin_short_backtrace 3: std::rt::lang_start::{{closure}} 4: core::ops::function::impls:: for &F>::call_once at /rustc/c2804e6ec2c29a5c7368600ea173b890e2655c3d/library/core/src/ops/function.rs:280:13 5: std::panicking::try::do_call at /rustc/c2804e6ec2c29a5c7368600ea173b890e2655c3d/library/std/src/panicking.rs:492:40 6: std::panicking::try at /rustc/c2804e6ec2c29a5c7368600ea173b890e2655c3d/library/std/src/panicking.rs:456:19 7: std::panic::catch_unwind at /rustc/c2804e6ec2c29a5c7368600ea173b890e2655c3d/library/std/src/panic.rs:137:14 8: std::rt::lang_start_internal::{{closure}} at /rustc/c2804e6ec2c29a5c7368600ea173b890e2655c3d/library/std/src/rt.rs:148:48 9: std::panicking::try::do_call at /rustc/c2804e6ec2c29a5c7368600ea173b890e2655c3d/library/std/src/panicking.rs:492:40 10: std::panicking::try at /rustc/c2804e6ec2c29a5c7368600ea173b890e2655c3d/library/std/src/panicking.rs:456:19 11: std::panic::catch_unwind at /rustc/c2804e6ec2c29a5c7368600ea173b890e2655c3d/library/std/src/panic.rs:137:14 12: std::rt::lang_start_internal at /rustc/c2804e6ec2c29a5c7368600ea173b890e2655c3d/library/std/src/rt.rs:148:20 13: main 14: 15: __libc_start_main 16: _start at /build/glibc/src/glibc/csu/../sysdeps/x86_64/start.S:115 ```
